alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 05 at 3:06AM AKDT until October 06 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight AKDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
